AlbumDreamer

Dreams up music albums for any concept given!

About

Harmonies of the Parahuman: A Worm Soundscape

Worm: The Web Serial

From the haunting nocturne of a city alive with superpowers, to the symphony of a girl amidst a swirling vortex of insects, to the towering arrival of a water-bound monstrosity, this album captures the sonic essence of a world both extraordinary and terrifying. Each track brings to life the rebellious spirit of a band of misfits, and the transformative ascension of a figure controlling countless beings across dimensions.

Brockton Bay Nocturne

A nighttime cityscape viewed from above, with various districts subtly differentiated - upscale neighborhoods, grimy industrial areas, neglected slums. The city is suffused with a soft, eerie luminescence from thousands of insects, all under the control of a solitary figure on a rooftop.

Skitter's Symphony

A girl standing amidst a swirling vortex of insects, her face a mask of determination. The background alternates between the chaos of a city in turmoil and the quiet solitude of her loft.

Leviathan's Arrival

A towering monstrosity rising from the ocean, dwarfing the city before it. Waves crash around it, and storm clouds gather overhead, casting an ominous shadow over the scene.

Undersiders' Gambit

A group of misfit teenagers, each with their own distinct style and symbol, planning their next move in a graffiti-covered hideout. They look determined but also nervous, highlighting the high stakes of their plans.

Ascension of Khepri

A figure, transformed and radiant, stands before an array of portals, each showing glimpses of different dimensions. The figure's arms are outstretched, controlling countless heroes and villains from across the multiverse.
